name: 3D Bio Hospital Infection Crisis - Zombie Outbreak
name_original: 3D Bio Hospital Infection Crisis - Zombie Outbreak
description: Visually beautiful zombie virus infection bio war game! Destroy all the infection zombies or be zombie dinner! Cool Fps style shooting game. Fps zombie shooting games have never been so scary and amazing! Everyone loves zombie survival games and sniping the undead walking free about. Join us in the undead assault on the hospital infected humans. A zombie hunter chase game your gonna love!
